channel.title: Making char files save
channel.description:
Well, I downloaded Mod Vigan's base 474. I checked the char files, and they come out as .DAT file extensions. I realize they can come out different, but how would i go about making them save? Thanks!
Chris :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2009, 08:42:48 pm[/size][hr]Anybody?I just want to know how to make character files save..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2009, 10:02:28 am[/size][hr]Come ON!!!
